title: LeBron James-Michael Jordan, Antonio Brown, and the face of the NBA
itunes:title: LeBron James-Michael Jordan, Antonio Brown, and the face of the NBA
description:
Colin explains why Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James beating Michael Jordan's scoring record meant nothing, why Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown will soon disappear, and who will be the next face of the NBA. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Brian Scalabrine, DeAngelo Hall, Peter Schrager, and Enes Kanter. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
